EntryName	SIRB1_HUMAN
ProteinName	Signal-regulatory protein beta-1 (SIRP-beta-1) (CD172 antigen-like family member B) (CD antigen CD172b)
GeneName	SIRPB1
Length	181
Function	Immunoglobulin-like cell surface receptor involved in the negative regulation of receptor tyrosine kinase-coupled signaling processes. Also participates in the recruitment of tyrosine kinase SYK. Triggers activation of myeloid cells when associated with TYROBP (PubMed:10604985).
Subcellular Location	Cell membrane
